Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
full_summary:
## Invitation to Qualify: Renovation of Staff Quarters for the Embassy of Canada to Mexico

**Project Reference**: cb-9402-82366568

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Brief Overview**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites suppliers with experience in delivering construction services to submit a response and qualify for the planned renovation of Staff Quarters for the Embassy of Canada to Mexico, located in Mexico City.

**Scope of Work**

The renovation project encompasses approximately 280 m² of work on the 7th floor of an 11-storey Staff Quarters building in Mexico City. The scope of work will include fit-up activities in architectural, mechanical, and electrical disciplines to renovate existing facilities, including:

* Access hall
* Dining room
* Living room
* Balconies
* Bedrooms
* Kitchen
* Laundry area
* Maid quarters
* Toilets and washrooms

**Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)**

This ITQ outlines the requirements for the qualification of respondents for the project. Interested respondents are required to submit a response to the ITQ. The Canadian government intends to select qualified respondents to participate in the Request for Proposals (RFP) stage of the solicitation.

**Project Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Mexico
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Lydia Zervos
* **Email**: [lydia.zervos@international.gc.ca](mailto:lydia.zervos@international.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (343) 572-7269

**Attachments**

The following documents are attached to this ITQ:

* Questions and Answers (PDF)
* ITQ Addendum 1 (PDF)
* ITQ (PDF)
* Addendum 2 (PDF)

Note: This is the rewritten text without any modifications in formatting. You may format it differently as you wish.  Also, make sure to check for any grammatical, punctuation, or spelling errors before publishing the final product. I am available to assist you further. Let me know if you want me to make any changes.  Best,
